song_name: Metroid Fusion - Facing a Huge Reaction
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Metroid Fusion - Facing a Huge Reaction is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Metroid Fusion - Facing a Huge Reaction is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
